attributes.action: Change the BBC Children in Need Pudsey Bear back to his former self.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ever since 2007 The BBC Has ruined the Pudsey Bear for CiN He is meant to represent damaged childhood (hence the bandage) while still being cute and a loveable image. Now he looks like a fat, creepy human-bear with a pair of knickers over his eye.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
